events.title: THE BIRTH OF THE BEST OF CREATION, OUR PROPHET MUHAMMAD, AL-MUSTAFA ﷺ
THE PROPHET’S ﷺ CHEST IS SPLIT OPEN
THE DEATH OF THE MOTHER OF THE PROPHET ﷺ AAMINAH BINT WAHB, AND SUCKLING AT THE HANDS OF UMM AYMAN, HIS WET NURSE
events.location: Between Mecca and Medina (near the territory of the tribe of al-Naabighah)

events.title: THE PROPHET ﷺ IN THE CARE OF HIS GRANDFATHER ABDUL-MUTALLIB
DEATH OF ABD AL-MUTALLIB (GRANDFATHER OF THE PROPHET ﷺ)
THE PROPHET ﷺ UNDER THE WING OF HIS UNCLE ABOO TAALIB
THE SACRILEGIOUS WAR (AL-FIJAAR)
THE OATH OF THE RIGHTEOUS (HILF AL-FUDOOL)
The Marriage of the Prophet Muhammad ﷺ to Khadijah bint Khuwaylid (May Allah be pleased with her)
The Prophet Muhammad ﷺ Places the Black Stone in its Place in the Ka'bah
The First Revelation and the Prophethood of the Prophet Muhammad ﷺ
The Cessation of Revelation (Fatra) and the Revelation of Surah Ad-Duha
The First People to Believe in Allah and His Messenger ﷺ
events.age: ~40 (at the time of the first believers)

events.title: The Persecution of the Companions by the Quraysh in the Early Days of Islam
Quraysh Asks Abu Talib to Stop the Messenger of Allah ﷺ
The Islam of Hamza ibn Abd al-Muttalib (may Allah be pleased with him)
The Islam of Umar (may Allah be pleased with him)
The Islam of At-Tufail ibn Amr Ad-Dausi (may Allah be pleased with him)
The Siege of Quraysh on the Muslims in Shi'b Abi Talib
Quraysh Annuls the Document of Boycott
The Death of Umm al-Mu'minin Khadijah bint Khuwaylid (may Allah be pleased with her)
The Prophet's ﷺ Journey to Ta'if
The Islam of the Jinn and Their Arrival to the Prophet ﷺ
The Death of Abu Talib, the Prophet's ﷺ Uncle
The Prophet's ﷺ Marriage to Sawdah bint Zam'ah (may Allah be pleased with her)
The Beginning of the Ansar's Entry into Islam
The Prophet's ﷺ Marriage to Aisha bint Abu Bakr As-Siddiq (may Allah be pleased with them both)
ہجرت مدینہ
